detail.name: Wood
detail.description: Found in trees, or on the ground.

detail.name: Stone
detail.description: Find it on the ground or on the rock.

detail.name: Iron
detail.description: Melt it on a Firepit or a Smelter

detail.name: Animal Fat
detail.description: Useful to craft bullet and clothes

detail.name: Workbench
detail.description: Allow you to make new items.

detail.name: Wood Spear
detail.description: Don't forget to pick it up.

detail.name: 9MM
detail.description: I hope you know how to aim.

detail.name: Shotgun
detail.description: He's dead now, don't you think?

detail.name: Metal Low Door
detail.description: Killing at home, for more comfort.

detail.name: Chapka
detail.description: You look like a real woodcutter.

detail.name: Winter Coat
detail.description: Is the weather really that cold?

detail.name: Radiation Suit
detail.description: Let's not grow a second head.

detail.name: Firepit
detail.description: Warm up and melt iron slowly.

detail.name: Stone Door
detail.description: Not too heavy to open, I hope.

detail.name: Sulfur
detail.description: Sulfur in such a cold landscape?

detail.name: Shaped Uranium
detail.description: Are you out of your mind?

detail.name: Research Bench
detail.description: Allow you to make new items

detail.name: Uranium
detail.description: Do you want to end up as Marie Curie?

detail.name: Sleeping Bag
detail.description: Once dead, you keep your base

detail.name: Sawed Off
detail.description: Shoot less far, do more damages

detail.name: Electronic Parts
detail.description: Break TV's and Computers to find it

detail.name: Big Wire
detail.description: Break big computers in power station (in the city)

detail.name: Tesla Bench
detail.description: Allow you to make powerful items

detail.name: Landmine
detail.description: When you feel it, it's too late

detail.name: Dynamite
detail.description: Get out of here, it gonna blow!

detail.name: C4
detail.description: Explode when you hit the trigger!

detail.name: C4 Trigger
detail.description: Don't press the button or else...

detail.name: Grenade
detail.description: Explodes when you throw it away.

detail.name: Lapadone
detail.description: You are faster a certain time.

detail.name: Small Wire
detail.description: Find it on TV's and computers in abandonned houses

detail.name: Pumpkin
detail.description: Eat it or craft a pumpkin ghoul

detail.name: Extractor
detail.description: Allows you to extract minerals from the ground

detail.name: Rare Flower
detail.description: Use it to make an antidote

detail.name: Acorn
detail.description: Eat it or plant a tree

detail.name: Gate OR
detail.description: Activate only if an entry is on.

detail.name: Gate AND
detail.description: Activate only if all entries are on.

detail.name: Gate NOT
detail.description: Activate only if no entry is on.

detail.name: Lamp
detail.description: Turn on when connected, damage ghoul

detail.name: Cable  - Wall
detail.description: Wall that can be connected to a cable

detail.name: Automatic Door
detail.description: Connect it to a switch to open and close it.

detail.name: Bunker Wall
detail.description: Good old memory of the wasteland.

detail.name: Welding Machine
detail.description: Allow you to make logic gates

detail.name: Gate Xor
detail.description: Activate only if only one entry is on.
